Package org.opengrok.indexer.analysis

Class ExpandTabsReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Reader
      • java.io.FilterReader
        • org.opengrok.indexer.analysis.ExpandTabsReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Readable
    public class ExpandTabsReader
extends java.io.FilterReader
    Wrapper around Reader to expand tabs to spaces in the input.

    • Method Detail

      • wrap

        public static java.io.Reader wrap​(java.io.Reader in,
                                  Project p)
        Wrap a reader in an ExpandTabsReader if the project has custom tab size settings.
        Parameters:
        in - the reader to wrap
        p - the project
        Returns:
        in if the project doesn't have custom tab settings; otherwise, an ExpandTabsReader that wraps in and expands tabs as defined by the project's settings

      • wrap

        public static java.io.Reader wrap​(java.io.Reader in,
                                  int tabSize)
        Wrap a reader in an ExpandTabsReader if the tabSize is positive.
        Parameters:
        in - the reader to wrap
        tabSize - a value effective only if greater than zero
        Returns:
        in if the tabSize is not positive; otherwise, an ExpandTabsReader that wraps in and expands tabs

      • translate

        public static int translate​(java.lang.String line,
                            int column,
                            int tabSize)
        Translates a specified line column offset (0-based) to an offset computed when translating for the specified tab size in accordance with ExpandTabsReader read handling.
        Parameters:
        line - a defined instance
        column - a value greater than or equal to zero and less than or equal to line length
        tabSize - a value effective only if greater than zero
        Returns:
        a translated offset
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if column is invalid for line
